Description: Acacia wood shabti of Renpetnefret with a lappet-wig, a carved face with the ears traced with black as are the crossed hands holding the two hoes, the legs are inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in eight rows of black painted hieroglyphs separated with black lines, the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket(?) traced with black, beneath the foot is a small plinth.
